name: Friendly Fire (itch) (Diego Escalante)
description:
Description:
You are a spelunker exploring dark caverns. Bloodthirsty bats are out to get you, but luckily you have your trusty torch to keep them at bay. It would be a shame if the flame would go out...

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 46 Compo in April of 2020. The theme of the jam was "Keep It Alive." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 1383 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 3993.563Fun 5403.25Innovation 8542.859Theme 7713.359Graphics 1733.969Audio 2283.531Humor 6502.466Mood 1603.71
